verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> be-'ash-tei- eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man יַ֠עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after אָ֨מְרָה <S%H559><s%> 'A-me-rah hath said צֹּ֤ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor because that Tyrus עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim against Jerusalem הֶאָ֔ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach, Aha נִשְׁבְּרָ֛ה <S%H7665><s%> nish-be-Rah she is broken דַּלְת֥וֹת <S%H1817><s%> dal-Tot [that was] the gates הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim of the people נָסֵ֣בָּה <S%H5437><s%> na-Seb-bah she is turned אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me אִמָּלְאָ֖ה <S%H4390><s%> 'im-mal-'Ah unto me I shall be replenished הָחֳרָֽבָה׃ <S%H2717><s%> ho-cho-Ra-vah. [now] she is laid waste

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich I am against צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor; Behold I [am] against thee O Tyrus וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ti to come up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, and will cause many כְּהַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> ke-ha-'a-Lot to come up הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam against thee as the sea לְגַלָּֽיו׃ <S%H1530><s%> le-gal-Lav. causeth his waves

וְשִׁחֲת֞וּ <S%H7843><s%> ve-shi-cha-Tu And they shall destroy חֹמ֣וֹת <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mot the walls צֹ֗ר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor, of Tyrus וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <S%H2040><s%> ve-ha-re-Su and break down מִגְדָּלֶ֔יהָ <S%H4026><s%> mig-da-Lei-ha, her towers וְסִֽחֵיתִ֥י <S%H5500><s%> ve-si-chei-Ti I will also scrape עֲפָרָ֖הּ <S%H6083><s%> 'a-fa-Rah her dust מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah; from וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti from her and make אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah לִצְחִ֥יחַ <S%H6706><s%> litz-Chi-ach her like the top סָֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> Sa-la'. of a rock

מִשְׁטַ֨ח <S%H4894><s%> mish-Tach It shall be [a place for] the spreading חֲרָמִ֤ים <S%H2764><s%> cha-ra-Mim of nets תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh will become בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, of the sea כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah will become לְבַ֖ז <S%H957><s%> le-Vaz and it shall become a spoil לַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> lag-go-Yim. to the nations

וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha And her daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, which [are] in the field בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword תֵּהָרַ֑גְנָה <S%H2026><s%> te-ha-Rag-nah; shall be slain וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> choh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I will bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- upon צֹ֗ר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor, upon Tyrus נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon from the north מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech a king מְלָכִ֑ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim; of kings בְּס֛וּס <S%H5483><s%> be-Sus with horses וּבְרֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> u-ve-Re-chev and with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> u-ve-fa-ra-Shim and with horsemen וְקָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> ve-ka-Hal and companies וְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am- people רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> Rav. and much

בְּנוֹתַ֥יִךְ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Ta-yich thy daughters בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev with the sword יַהֲרֹ֑ג <S%H2026><s%> ya-ha-Rog; He shall slay וְנָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and he shall make עָלַ֜יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against דָּיֵ֗ק <S%H1785><s%> da-Yek, a fort וְשָׁפַ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> ve-sha-Fach against thee and cast עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against סֹֽלְלָ֔ה <S%H5550><s%> so-le-Lah, a mount וְהֵקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> ve-he-Kim against thee and lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich against צִנָּֽה׃ <S%H6793><s%> tzin-Nah. the buckler

וּמְחִ֣י <S%H4239><s%> u-me-Chi engines קָֽבָלּ֔וֹ <S%H6904><s%> ka-val-Lo, of war יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten And he shall set בְּחֹֽמוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> be-cho-mo-Ta-yich; against thy walls וּמִ֨גְדְּלֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H4026><s%> u-Mig-de-lo-Ta-yich, thy towers יִתֹּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> yit-Totz he shall break down בְּחַרְבוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H2719><s%> be-char-vo-Tav. and with his axes

מִשִּׁפְעַ֥ת <S%H8229><s%> mish-shif-'At By reason of the abundance סוּסָ֖יו <S%H5483><s%> su-Sav of his horses יְכַסֵּ֣ךְ <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Sech shall cover אֲבָקָ֑ם <S%H80><s%> 'a-va-Kam; their dust מִקּוֹל֩ <S%H6963><s%> mik-kOl at the noise פָּרַ֨שׁ <S%H6571><s%> pa-Rash of the horsemen וְגַלְגַּ֜ל <S%H1534><s%> ve-gal-Gal and of the wheels וָרֶ֗כֶב <S%H7393><s%> va-Re-chev, and of the chariots תִּרְעַ֙שְׁנָה֙ <S%H7493><s%> tir-'Ash-nah shall shake חֽוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> cho-mo-Ta-yich, thee thy walls בְּבֹאוֹ֙ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O when he shall enter בִּשְׁעָרַ֔יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Ra-yich, into thy gates כִּמְבוֹאֵ֖י <S%H3996><s%> kim-vo-'Ei as men enter עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir into a city מְבֻקָּעָֽה׃ <S%H1234><s%> me-vuk-ka-'Ah. wherein is made a breach

בְּפַרְס֣וֹת <S%H6541><s%> be-far-Sot With the hoofs סוּסָ֔יו <S%H5483><s%> su-Sav, of his horses יִרְמֹ֖ס <S%H7429><s%> yir-Mos shall he tread down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֽוּצוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H2351><s%> chu-tzo-Ta-yich; all thy streets עַמֵּךְ֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-meCh thy people בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev by the sword יַהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> ya-ha-Rog, he shall slay וּמַצְּב֥וֹת <S%H4676><s%> u-matz-tze-Vot garrisons עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zech and thy strong לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz to the ground תֵּרֵֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> te-Red. shall go down

וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <S%H7997><s%> ve-shal-Lu And they shall make a spoil חֵילֵ֗ךְ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lech, of thy riches וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <S%H962><s%> u-va-ze-Zu and make a prey רְכֻלָּתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7404><s%> re-chul-la-Tech, of thy merchandise וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <S%H2040><s%> ve-ha-re-Su and they shall break down חוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> cho-mo-Ta-yich, thy walls וּבָתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-Tei houses חֶמְדָּתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2532><s%> chem-da-Tech thy pleasant יִתֹּ֑צוּ <S%H5422><s%> yit-To-tzu; and destroy וַאֲבָנַ֤יִךְ <S%H68><s%> va-'a-va-Na-yich thy stones וְעֵצַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'e-Tza-yich and thy timber וַֽעֲפָרֵ֔ךְ <S%H6083><s%> va-'a-fa-Rech, and thy dust בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of the water יָשִֽׂימוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> ya-Si-mu. and they shall lay

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֖י <S%H7673><s%> ve-hish-bat-Ti to cease הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> ha-Mon And I will cause the noise שִׁירָ֑יִךְ <S%H7892><s%> shi-Ra-yich; of thy songs וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the sound כִּנּוֹרַ֔יִךְ <S%H3658><s%> kin-no-Ra-yich, of thy harps לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-sha-Ma' shall be no more heard עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. more

וּנְתַתִּ֞יךְ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tich And I will make לִצְחִ֣יחַ <S%H6706><s%> litz-Chi-ach thee like the top סֶ֗לַע <S%H5553><s%> Se-la', of a rock מִשְׁטַ֤ח <S%H4894><s%> mish-Tach upon חֲרָמִים֙ <S%H2764><s%> cha-ra-Mim nets תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh, become לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no תִבָּנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> tib-ba-Neh thou shalt be built ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; more כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. no more for I the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD לְצ֑וֹר <S%H6865><s%> le-Tzor; to Tyrus הֲלֹ֣א׀ <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo at מִקּ֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> mik-Kol at the sound מַפַּלְתֵּ֗ךְ <S%H4658><s%> map-pal-Tech, of thy fall בֶּאֱנֹ֨ק <S%H602><s%> be-'e-Nok cry חָלָ֜ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal when the wounded בֵּהָ֤רֵֽג <S%H2026><s%> be-Ha-reg is made הֶ֙רֶג֙ <S%H2027><s%> he-reg when the slaughter בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Chech, in the midst יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H7493><s%> yir-'a-Shu shake הָאִיִּֽים׃ <S%H339><s%> ha-'i-Yim. Shall not the isles

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-re-Du shall come down מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from כִּסְאוֹתָ֗ם <S%H3678><s%> kis-'o-Tam, from their thrones כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei Then all the princes הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, of the sea וְהֵסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> ve-he-Si-ru and lay away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְעִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4598><s%> me-'I-lei-Hem, their robes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei garments רִקְמָתָ֖ם <S%H7553><s%> rik-ma-Tam their broidered יִפְשֹׁ֑טוּ <S%H6584><s%> yif-Sho-tu; and put off חֲרָד֤וֹת׀ <S%H2731><s%> cha-ra-Dot themselves with trembling יִלְבָּ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> yil-Ba-shu they shall clothe עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz upon the ground יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <S%H3427><s%> ye-She-vu, they shall sit וְחָֽרְדוּ֙ <S%H2729><s%> ve-cha-re-Du and shall tremble לִרְגָעִ֔ים <S%H7281><s%> lir-ga-'Im, at [every] moment וְשָׁמְמ֖וּ <S%H8074><s%> ve-sha-me-Mu and be astonished עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich. and
